home.title: A capable development studio from Finland
home.textWhoWeAre1: Suloke is a fullstack development studio offering professional design, planning, management and development in all things IT. Our team brings together over two decades of demanding industry experience in IT-development, ensuring predictability and quality of service.
home.textWhoWeAre2: Our core values are quality, transparency and trust. Our experienced core team strives for quality of service and customer experience. We work collaboratively with you, keeping open communications and transparency as our central guidelines. Facilitating trust among stakeholders creates success; we are a reliable partner.
home.quote: Suloke was tasked by Arbonaut with a challenging full-stack development: an application integrating satellite and crowdsourced wildfire data, with mobile and web portals. Suloke's skilled experts undertook the task with vigour, skilfully and independently delivering a comprehensive app. I am highly impressed with the outcome and happily recommend Suloke for demanding development tasks!

teamSection.title: THE CORE TEAM
teamSection.ahmedDesc: Ahmed handles Backend development at Suloke, as well as database management, AI and big data analytics. Within his 7-years of demanding industry experience, he worked on various projects with the World Bank, including the ProACT-platform
teamSection.sowrovDesc: With decade of industry experience with mobile development, Sowrov is working with all aspects of Frontend development from multi-platform mobile applications to web applications.
teamSection.samuliDesc: The general manager at Suloke, Samuli also takes the lead in all things design. With a background in graphic design and marketing, he will guide you through the user-side considerations of your business.

webPage.title: WEB DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT
webPage.text1: A website is often the first and defining impression of a company, a calling card forming the expectations for the quality of the service. An intently designed, fast and intuitive website creates an impression that defines the brand. It communicates that the organization is established and capable.
webPage.text2: We build fully customizable sites using Next.js, with Content Management Systems created with Strapi. Leveraging our extensive experience and adherence to the principles of Clean Architecture, we have developed numerous libraries that enable the rapid creation of tailored user interfaces and seamless integrations with third-party services or customer business systems.
webPage.text3: Our team can create the impression, and the functionality you need.
webPage.text4: Proper planning, collaborative design, interactive prototyping and transparent communications. We know how to make it look easy.
webPage.text5: In a sea of choices, the details matter. We use cutting edge technology to make your site fast, discoverable and impressive, to the search engines and the user.
webPage.text6: Be it an online marketplace, a visually impressive brand-statement or a web-component of a larger system, our expert team can create it. We tailor everything to fit our customer business needs.
webPage.contentText1: We start by mapping out your business needs, target audience and goals for the project. We go through the options; best practices and integrations of technologies for your individual business case. An important goal of discovery is creating a working relationship with you, and to find out what we can do for you. The result of discovery is a mutually created set of requirements that paints a clear picture of what we are building.
webPage.contentText2: Once the requirements are clear, we collaboratively design an interactive prototype with you, using Figma. Thus we are able to visualize and test the User Interface with you and all relevant stakeholders; we introduce Usability Testing for more personalized UI-solutions.
webPage.contentText3: With a ready and tested prototype of the site as the guide, we begin development. We use Next.Js; a cutting edge development framework for designing fast and sleek web-applications. Next.Js incorporates Server-Side Rendering(SSR) and Static Site Generation(SSG), making the site fast and easily discoverable for search engines. The open source Strapi is used for the customized Content Management System. The site will be implemented using Clean Architecture, ensuring ease of maintenance and further development down the line.
webPage.contentText4: The ready site will be subjected to User Acceptance Testing, masking sure the site adheres to the requirements set with the customer during Discovery and Design. Once the web-application has been launched, our team provides you with guidance and support in using the site, as well as a period of guarantee for the proper functioning of your new site.

mobilePage.quote: Suloke was tasked by Arbonaut with a challenging full-stack development: an application integrating satellite and crowdsourced wildfire data, with mobile and web portals. Suloke's skilled experts undertook the task with vigour, skilfully and independently delivering a comprehensive app. I am highly impressed with the outcome and happily recommend Suloke for demanding development tasks!
mobilePage.title: MOBILE DEVELOPMENT
mobilePage.text1: Suloke offers over a decade of experience in mobile app development, with a special emphasis on crowdsourcing and map-integration. We know that understanding the customers needs is key to successful app development. We work by collaborative design, integrating stakeholders into the planning process from the get-go. And whatever the plan, our experienced project management can weave the technology in to the shape you need.
mobilePage.contentText1: We start by mapping out your business needs, target audience and goals for the project. We go through the options; best practices and integrations of technologies for your individual business case. An important goal of discovery is creating a working relationship with you, and to find out what we can do for you. The result of discovery is a mutually created set of requirements, that paints a clear picture of what we are building.
mobilePage.contentText2: Once requirements are clear, the next step is to map out the required features for MVP (minimum viable product), as well as the technologies to be used. This tech stack might be between native solutions, cross-platform solutions or PWA-type web applications. During planning we outline major UI-components and integrations, as well as necessary compliance- and security guidelines.
mobilePage.contentText3: Once required features, workflows and the tech stack are identified, we create an interactive prototype in collaboration with you. With it, we are able to visualize and test the User Interface with you and all relevant stakeholders; we introduce Usability Testing for more personalized UI-solutions. During this process we will use platform-specific guidelines: Material Design for Android and Human Interface Guidelines for iOS. These guidelines offload developer time and allow the UI and UX that users are accustomed to.
mobilePage.contentText4: With a ready and tested prototype of the application as the guide, we begin development. We use Swift for iOS, Kotlin for Android, React Native and Flutter for cross-platform. For testing we use Appium and Espresson for the User Interface; Github Actions for CI/CD pipelines. The app will be constructed using Clean Architecture, ensuring ease of maintenance and further development down the line.
mobilePage.contentText5: The ready app will be subjected to User Acceptance Testing, making sure the site adheres to the requirements set with the customer during Discovery and Design. Deployment of the ready, tested and approved app will go through Google Play Store for Android; Apple Store for iOS; Appcenter or similar for internal artefact distribution. Other avenues of deployment are possible.
mobilePage.contentText6: During post-deployment, we use tools such as Firebase Crashlytics to pinpoint and fix issues with stability. We also use performance tools, like Firebase Performance Analytics, to ensure the app runs smoothly. We can collect additional usage data on how users use the application, to further evaluate how well it fits customer needs and what features are lacking to further develop the application. We are able to collect behavioral data, usage engagement, feedback and technical data.

aiPage.title: AI
aiPage.text1: We believe in leveraging AI responsibly, focusing on delivering measurable and durable Return on Investment. Starting from a baseline analysis of your operations and business needs, we design and build optimal AI-solutions that provide real, actionable value to your bottom line.
aiPage.text2: Our team is dedicated to creating sustainable solutions that bring real life value to our customers, presenting to you a communicative and flexible partner in the future-proofing your operations.
aiPage.text3: We design Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solutions that allow AI to work safely and accurately with your own data: documents, knowledge bases, wikis, CRMs and internal systems. Instead of relying on a generic model, the AI retrieves relevant, up-to-date information from your sources and uses it to generate grounded, auditable answers.
aiPage.text4: Typical use cases include internal support assistants, “chat with your documents”, technical documentation copilots, and decision-support tools for specialists. Our RAG implementations are designed with security, access control, and monitoring in mind, ensuring that the right people see the right information at the right time.
aiPage.contentText1:
We have a wide repertoire of capabilities in creating bespoke applications using AI-technology for each individual use case. These include developing chatbots, natural language User Interfaces, AI-powered backend data analysis, Computer Vision for quality control or document processing, Predictive Models informing responses, and dashboards with key and advanced features to facilitate effective decision making.

Our solutions are engineered from the ground up to fit your unique workflows, operations, and business needs.

We design Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solutions that allow AI to work safely and accurately with your own data: documents, knowledge bases, wikis, CRMs and internal systems. Instead of relying on a generic model, the AI retrieves relevant, up-to-date information from your sources and uses it to generate grounded, auditable answers.

Typical use cases include internal support assistants, “chat with your documents”, technical documentation copilots, and decision-support tools for specialists. Our RAG implementations are designed with security, access control, and monitoring in mind, ensuring that the right people see the right information at the right time.
aiPage.contentText2:
We design and build AI agents using tools like n8n to connect disparate applications and services in a purposeful manner. We create custom nodes and logic to orchestrate information and action between CRM, ERP, communication platforms, databases, and your internal systems. These customized workflows can be made to run on your own servers, incorporating Human-In-The-Loop approval steps, with reusability baked into the architecture from the start — providing you with predictable and sustainable AI-agents.

We can automate complex business processes, such as Lead Management, Data Synchronization, and Notification Systems. Providing you with efficient, affordable, scalable and visually legible automation solutions.
aiPage.contentText3:
Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers are standardized connectors that act as governed bridges for AIs to interact with your internal systems. Through an MCP server, AI can execute specific, authenticated actions and access real-time information from your internal APIs, databases and software. For example a personal AI assistant can read and create entries in your calendar, using an MCP server to connect with your data.

Creating an MCP server, you decide on how AI should interact with your systems, while opening them up to a wider and more purposeful AI-integration; future-proofing your business.

MCP server unlocks the full potential of AI by connecting it directly to your Core Business Operations. This enables AI to be used in a powerful, custom-tailored manner; achieving deep, actionable AI-integration with enterprise-level security and governance.

privacyPolicy.text2: , one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Suloke.com and how we use it. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Suloke.com. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
privacyPolicy.text3: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
privacyPolicy.text4: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information. If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide. When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
privacyPolicy.text5: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
privacyPolicy.li1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
privacyPolicy.li2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
privacyPolicy.li3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
privacyPolicy.li4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
privacyPolicy.li5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
privacyPolicy.text6: follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
privacyPolicy.text8: uses “cookies”. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.
privacyPolicy.text9: 's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.
privacyPolicy.text10: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.
privacyPolicy.title8: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
privacyPolicy.text11: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
privacyPolicy.li11: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
privacyPolicy.li12: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
privacyPolicy.li13: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
privacyPolicy.li14: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.text12: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
privacyPolicy.li15: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
privacyPolicy.li16: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
privacyPolicy.li17: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacyPolicy.li18: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacyPolicy.li19: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacyPolicy.li20: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
privacyPolicy.li21: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.text13: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity. Suloke.com does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
privacyPolicy.text14: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.
privacyPolicy.text15: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at contact@suloke.com

contactCard.text: Let us find out together, how we can help you reach your business goals!
